languages.text: "Это еще что такое?" {n}Мохнатые брови Найджа сердито сталкиваются друг с другом, и вам чудится, что по ним пробегает разряд.{/n} "Никак у нас завелись контрабандисты! Кто еще такие странные послания будет в тайники прятать? На турбине их всех четвертую, на турбине! Теперь бы узнать что они там контрабандируют..."

"What is that?" {n}Nije's thick eyebrows knit together angrily, and you almost think you see a power charge jolt across them.{/n} "We've got smugglers on the loose! Who else would be hiding these strange messages? I'll have them all drawn and quartered on the turbine, I will! Now I'd like to find out what they're smuggling..."
languages.original_text: "Это еще что такое?" {n}Мохнатые брови Найджа сердито сталкиваются друг с другом, и вам чудится, что по ним пробегает разряд.{/n} "Никак у нас завелись контрабандисты! Кто еще такие странные послания будет в тайники прятать? На турбине их всех четвертую, на турбине! Теперь бы узнать что они там контрабандируют..."

Who else would be hiding these strange messages? I'll have them all drawn and quartered on the turbine, I will! Now I'd like to find out what they're smuggling..."

Who else would be hiding these strange messages? I'll have them all drawn and quartered on the turbine, I will! Now I'd like to find out what they're smuggling..."

languages.text: «¿Qué es eso?». {n}Las pobladas cejas de Nije se unen en su entrecejo, y tal es su enfado que casi te parece ver una chispa saltar de una a otra.{/n} «¡Tenemos contrabandistas en el compartimento! ¿Quién si no iba a ocultar estos mensajes? ¡Los clavaré a una turbina hasta que revienten! Ahora lo que me interesa es saber qué material trabajan...».
languages.original_text: "What is that?" {n}Nije's thick eyebrows knit together angrily, and you almost think you see a power charge jolt across them.{/n} "We've got smugglers on the loose! Who else would be hiding these strange messages? I'll have them all drawn and quartered on the turbine, I will! Now I'd like to find out what they're smuggling..."

traits.locale_text: «¿Qué es eso?». {n}Las pobladas cejas de Nije se unen en su entrecejo, y tal es su enfado que casi te parece ver una chispa saltar de una a otra.{/n} «¡Tenemos contrabandistas en el compartimento! ¿Quién si no iba a ocultar estos mensajes? ¡Los clavaré a una turbina hasta que revienten! Ahora lo que me interesa es saber qué material trabajan...».

languages.text: 「それは何だ？」{n}ニジェの太い眉が、怒りをあらわにした。その瞬間、彼らの間に電撃が走るのが見えたような気がした。{/n}「密輸業者が逃亡している！他に誰がこの奇妙なメッセージを隠すというのです？タービンで全員、四つ裂きにしてやる！さて、彼らが何を密輸しているのか調べたいところですが…」
languages.original_text: "What is that?" {n}Nije's thick eyebrows knit together angrily, and you almost think you see a power charge jolt across them.{/n} "We've got smugglers on the loose! Who else would be hiding these strange messages? I'll have them all drawn and quartered on the turbine, I will! Now I'd like to find out what they're smuggling..."

traits.locale_text: 「それは何だ？」{n}ニジェの太い眉が、怒りをあらわにした。その瞬間、彼らの間に電撃が走るのが見えたような気がした。{/n}「密輸業者が逃亡している！他に誰がこの奇妙なメッセージを隠すというのです？タービンで全員、四つ裂きにしてやる！さて、彼らが何を密輸しているのか調べたいところですが…」

languages.text: “那是什么东西？”{n}尼杰浓密的眉毛愤怒地交织在一起，你仿佛看到电流从眉毛之间流了过去。{/n}“有走私犯混进来了！否则还能有谁会藏这些字条？我一定要抓住他们，把他们丢进涡轮机里绞碎，真的！要是能知道他们在走私什么东西就好了……”
languages.original_text: "What is that?" {n}Nije's thick eyebrows knit together angrily, and you almost think you see a power charge jolt across them.{/n} "We've got smugglers on the loose! Who else would be hiding these strange messages? I'll have them all drawn and quartered on the turbine, I will! Now I'd like to find out what they're smuggling..."

traits.locale_text: “那是什么东西？”{n}尼杰浓密的眉毛愤怒地交织在一起，你仿佛看到电流从眉毛之间流了过去。{/n}“有走私犯混进来了！否则还能有谁会藏这些字条？我一定要抓住他们，把他们丢进涡轮机里绞碎，真的！要是能知道他们在走私什么东西就好了……”

languages.text: "Was ist das?" {n}Nije kneift seine buschigen Augenbrauen wütend zusammen. Es wirkt beinahe, als würde sich ein Funken Energie zwischen ihnen entladen.{/n} "Wir haben flüchtige Schmuggler! Wer sonst sollte diese seltsamen Nachrichten verbergen? Ich lasse sie alle an die Turbine binden, so wahr ich hier stehe. Ich wüsste allerdings gerne, was sie schmuggeln ..."
languages.original_text: "What is that?" {n}Nije's thick eyebrows knit together angrily, and you almost think you see a power charge jolt across them.{/n} "We've got smugglers on the loose! Who else would be hiding these strange messages? I'll have them all drawn and quartered on the turbine, I will! Now I'd like to find out what they're smuggling..."

traits.locale_text: "Was ist das?" {n}Nije kneift seine buschigen Augenbrauen wütend zusammen. Es wirkt beinahe, als würde sich ein Funken Energie zwischen ihnen entladen.{/n} "Wir haben flüchtige Schmuggler! Wer sonst sollte diese seltsamen Nachrichten verbergen? Ich lasse sie alle an die Turbine binden, so wahr ich hier stehe. Ich wüsste allerdings gerne, was sie schmuggeln ..."

languages.text: « Qu'est-ce que c'est que ça ? » {n}Furieuse, Nije fronce les sourcils tellement fort que vous ne seriez pas {mf|étonné|étonnée} de voir un arc électrique soudainement les relier.{/n} « On a des contrebandiers dans la nature ! Qui d'autre pourrait bien s'amuser à planquer des messages aussi cryptiques ? Je vais tous les faire écarteler sur la turbine, croyez-moi sur parole ! Je serais curieuse de savoir ce qu'ils trafiquent… »
languages.original_text: "What is that?" {n}Nije's thick eyebrows knit together angrily, and you almost think you see a power charge jolt across them.{/n} "We've got smugglers on the loose! Who else would be hiding these strange messages? I'll have them all drawn and quartered on the turbine, I will! Now I'd like to find out what they're smuggling..."

traits.locale_text: « Qu'est-ce que c'est que ça ? » {n}Furieuse, Nije fronce les sourcils tellement fort que vous ne seriez pas {mf|étonné|étonnée} de voir un arc électrique soudainement les relier.{/n} « On a des contrebandiers dans la nature ! Qui d'autre pourrait bien s'amuser à planquer des messages aussi cryptiques ? Je vais tous les faire écarteler sur la turbine, croyez-moi sur parole ! Je serais curieuse de savoir ce qu'ils trafiquent… »

languages.text: "Bu nedir?" {n}Nije'nin kalın kaşları, öfkeli bir şekilde birbirine dolanıyor. Âdeta aralarında bir enerji yükünün gidip geldiğini görür gibisin.{/n} "Anlaşılan firarda kaçakçılarımız var! Böylesine tuhaf mesajları başka kim saklayabilir? Hepsini yerlerde sürükleyip türbinde parçalatacağım. Göreceksiniz! Şimdi neyin kaçakçılığını yaptıklarını bulma niyetindeyim..."
languages.original_text: "What is that?" {n}Nije's thick eyebrows knit together angrily, and you almost think you see a power charge jolt across them.{/n} "We've got smugglers on the loose! Who else would be hiding these strange messages? I'll have them all drawn and quartered on the turbine, I will! Now I'd like to find out what they're smuggling..."
